column2: The move comes in response to the crippling sanctions Western nations have imposed on Russia over its invasion of Ukraine, which this week tanked the ruble and sent Russians flocking to banks and ATMs.
column4: Putin signs decree to prohibit leaving Russia with more than $10,000 in foreign currency
